text: My sister died of Ovarian Cancer ~ She told me it is painful ~ Later I was diagnosed with #SquamousCellCarcinoma I was disabled already ~ I quit cutting my hair and waited to die ~ 2010 I heard about #Cannabis treating #Cancer ~ late in 2014 someone offered to help me I'm alive ~ https://t.co/PZuV8aTt9D https://t.co/6kzJKNKBeM
